import React from 'react'; import Aux from 'react-aux'; import Icon from '../../../../UI/Icon/Icon'; import Button from '../../../../UI/Button/Button'; const ResultOnlyBack = (props) => { let itemBackStyles = ['Item']; if (props.forUser) { itemBackStyles.push('Item--back--user'); } else { itemBackStyles.push('Item--back'); } return (

{props.cityName}

{props.temp}째
{props.description}
Min. {props.tempMin}째
Max. {props.tempMax}째
Humidity. {props.humidity}%
Wind Speed. {props.windSpeed} m/s
Deg. {props.windDeg}째
 ) } export default ResultOnlyBack;
